languages.text: "Тебя скорее всего направят в архивы поднимать записи о техножреце, что устанавливал орудие. У тебя есть лишние лет десять жизни, Паскаль?"

traits.locale_text: "Тебя скорее всего направят в архивы поднимать записи о техножреце, что устанавливал орудие. У тебя есть лишние лет десять жизни, Паскаль?"

languages.text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"
languages.original_text: "Тебя скорее всего направят в архивы поднимать записи о техножреце, что устанавливал орудие. У тебя есть лишние лет десять жизни, Паскаль?"

traits.locale_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"
"They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"
"They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

"They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"
"They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

languages.text: 「お前はせいぜい資料庫送りにされて、武器を取り付けた技術司祭の記録を掘り起こすはめになるだろう。パスカル、お前は人生の十年をそうやって費やす覚悟はあるのか？」
languages.original_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前はせいぜい資料庫送りにされて、武器を取り付けた技術司祭の記録を掘り起こすはめになるだろう。パスカル、お前は人生の十年をそうやって費やす覚悟はあるのか？」

languages.text: "Sie würden Euch vermutlich nur in die Archive schicken, um Unterlagen zu den Techpriestern hervorzukramen, die die Waffe installiert haben. Habt Ihr ein Jahrzehnt Eures Lebens Zeit, Pasqal?"
languages.original_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

traits.locale_text: "Sie würden Euch vermutlich nur in die Archive schicken, um Unterlagen zu den Techpriestern hervorzukramen, die die Waffe installiert haben. Habt Ihr ein Jahrzehnt Eures Lebens Zeit, Pasqal?"

languages.text: « On se contenterait probablement de vous envoyer aux archives pour chercher les registres concernant le technoprêtre qui a installé cette arme. Avez-vous dix ans à perdre, Pasqal ? »
languages.original_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

traits.locale_text: « On se contenterait probablement de vous envoyer aux archives pour chercher les registres concernant le technoprêtre qui a installé cette arme. Avez-vous dix ans à perdre, Pasqal ? »

languages.text: «Seguramente le remitirán a los archivos para que busque los informes del tecnosacerdote de turno que instaló aquí el arma. ¿Dispone de una década libre para ello, Pasqal?».
languages.original_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

traits.locale_text: «Seguramente le remitirán a los archivos para que busque los informes del tecnosacerdote de turno que instaló aquí el arma. ¿Dispone de una década libre para ello, Pasqal?».

languages.text: “如果你真的打算这么做，他们可能会把你打发到档案室，让你去找负责修改的技术神甫的相关记录。你真的有十年的时间可以浪费吗，帕斯卡？”
languages.original_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你真的打算这么做，他们可能会把你打发到档案室，让你去找负责修改的技术神甫的相关记录。你真的有十年的时间可以浪费吗，帕斯卡？”

languages.text: "Muhtemelen silahı kuran Tekno Rahip'e dair kayıtları bulman için seni arşive postalarlar. Hayatının birkaç yılını buna adamaya hazır mısın Pasqal?"
languages.original_text: "They would probably just send you to the archives digging up records on the Tech-Priest who installed the weapon. Do you have a decade of your life to spare, Pasqal?"
